Title: Horizon Restaurant
Description: The tower’s signature dining hall offers a palette-pleasing mix of Oriental and International cuisine. It offers an open buffet service daily from breakfast to dinner. Title: Amimoto Restaurant
Description: Amimoto, serves authentic Japanese dishes with a contemporary twist delivered by skilled chefs.

Title: Dasman Ballroom
Description: A specially furnished room for VIP government guests’ reception.

Title: AlWaha
Description: Relax and enjoy a cup of coffee at one of the country’s must-see places. Have a taste of quality drinks and luscious desserts.
